{{Flavour|Should the wearer of this amulet be levitated by magical means, he or she will be able to exercise some control over the resulting motion. This allows the descent of staircases and the retrieval of items lying on the ground, for example, but does not deprive the wearer of the benefits of levitation.}}

An '''amulet of controlled flight''' allows the wearer to pick up items from the ground and go up and down stairs while [[levitate|levitating]] by providing the [[Control Flight|control flight]] [[intrinsic]]. Essentially, it turns [[Levitation]] into [[fly]]ing.

==History==
*Amulets of controlled flight were removed in [[0.11]], though the [[amulet of the Air]] still had one as its base type.
**In [[0.12]], the amulet of the Air also lost controlled flight.
